note.p: Birth: Ferndene, Gateshead, County Durham, England (21 June 1857)
Buried: St Giles' cemetery, now Ascension Cemetery, Cambridge
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 717-732, plate, by E A Milne
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
